list_definition.definition: the ability to be fair and understanding to people whose ways, opinions etc are different from one’s own

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We should always try to show tolerance to other people.

list_definition.definition: the ability to resist the effects of eg a drug

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If you take a drug regularly, your body gradually acquires a tolerance of it.
